content: I imported our slack data as described in Zulip guide. Then I wanted to send reset password email to me as slack admin using manage.py. But I received message that user with such email doesn't exist. How can I check what users are imported from Slack / Is there any way to use manage.py to list users/emails in organization?
@Richard Koza you can do it with the manage.py shell, using e.g. UserProfile.objects.all()
It seems likely that the email address you had registered in Slack is different than you remembered.

@Tim Abbott Hi Tim, thank you for your reply. I found my problem, import was not completed, i had to run import again to import everything. i also found that using user-statsI managed to see all users in organization.
